an4.4:1.1: “When a foolish, incompetent untrue person acts wrongly toward four individuals they keep themselves broken and damaged. They deserve to be blamed and criticized by sensible people, and they brim with much wickedness.
an4.4:1.4: father … a Realized One … and a disciple of a Realized One.
an4.4:1.5: When a foolish, incompetent untrue person acts wrongly toward these four individuals they keep themselves broken and damaged. They deserve to be blamed and criticized by sensible people, and they brim with much wickedness.
an4.4:2.1: When an astute, competent true person acts rightly toward four individuals they keep themselves intact and unscathed. They don’t deserve to be blamed and criticized by sensible people, and they brim with much merit.
an4.4:2.4: father … a Realized One … and a disciple of a Realized One.
an4.4:2.5: When an astute, competent true person acts rightly toward these four individuals they keep themselves intact and unscathed. They don’t deserve to be blamed and criticized by sensible people, and they brim with much merit.
an4.4:3.3: or a Realized One, a Buddha,
an4.4:4.3: they’re criticized in this life by the astute,
an4.4:4.4: and they depart to be reborn in a place of loss.
an4.4:5.3: or a Realized One, a Buddha,
an4.4:6.3: they’re praised in this life by the astute,
an4.4:6.4: and they depart to rejoice in heaven.”
